businessDistrict.name: 3D Printing: Bringing Your 2D Memories to Life
businessDistrict.description: Want to know more about 3D printing? Want to know if 3D printing could be available for you to use? That's what we are examining for our MS Management capstone graduate project. We are exploring the 3D market as it stands today and evaluating if there is a cost effective solution where the average household would be able to use 3D printing technology as they desire.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Andrew Tobin, Omar Rahmaan, Maria De Filippo, Yordalis Corporan

businessDistrict.name: AR supplemental information in a Living Museum
businessDistrict.description: This exhibit uses AR (Augmented Reality) to provide supplemental information in a Living Museum and offers visitors of an engaging experience that is informative, innovative and enjoyable. This exhibit replicates the markers used in the Bergen Swamp, a New York State living museum. Visitors can use their own handheld device or use a device I provide, to view supplemental information of the various living things located at the marker.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Rita Locke Pettine, Steve Locke

businessDistrict.name: Business Is Fun: Saunders Welcome Center
businessDistrict.description: Visit the Saunders College of Business where you will find how fun business can be. Hear from our students and how they use technology to find solutions to everyday business problems. Free snow cones will be handed out!
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Lauren Heary

businessDistrict.name: Consulting for BioWorks
businessDistrict.description: Learn about the consulting process and gain insight into industries such as horticulture, agriculture, and bio-pesticides! During the spring semester, our group was involved in a consulting project with BioWorks, a local company that provides sustainable and environmentally friendly growing solutions. Our project focuses market research, competitor analysis, and recommendations on how to create a unique advantage in an increasingly competitive environment.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Meagan Kidder, Nikhil Srivastava, Sarah Baris

businessDistrict.name: Cryogenic Camera Consulting
businessDistrict.description: As a group we have been tasked to consult with Michael Zemcov about his cryogenic camera. The cryogenic camera is a camera that can work at temperatures below -100 degrees Celsius. Our job is to do market research to see if this product is something worth investing in.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Michael Bowen, Simona Blackshear, Gavin Markman, Natalie Flansburg

businessDistrict.name: Designing for Differences
businessDistrict.description: We are developing a business model and plan focused on product development, design and manufacturing operations and marketing and sales strategies for the promotion of the product. The business will address the needs of the designers, artists and those with disabilities in producing "design differences" furniture for our target market.. Each piece of furniture will be designed by the artist, created by people with disabilities and custom tagged to tell a story to the customer. Each design and piece of furniture will have unique attributes due to the contributions of the individuals involved in the manufacturing process as well as the sustainable materials used.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Susan Hansen, Patrick Reynolds, Llesy Alcantara, Ray Zayas, Silvia Caraballo

businessDistrict.name: Fleecimals: A Student's Stuffed Animal Busines
businessDistrict.description: My small business surrounding cute octopus stuffed animals. Some are just for fun, but others are useful. I have stingrays that are screen cleaners and an octopus that is both a heat and ice pack! We do custom orders too. Come check us out!
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Michelle Vullo, Noah Janis, Sarah Baris

businessDistrict.name: Fun with Sphero
businessDistrict.description: Sphero is a fun toy that gives everyone an opportunity to learn how to problem solve using programming all while having fun. Our exhibit is intended to introduce problem solving, programming, and robotics to kids of all ages.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Dave Ballard, Jaykumar Sharma, Jacob Dittenhauser, Kevin Lozano, Shruti Patel, Matt Arlauckas

businessDistrict.name: Giant Rochester Monopoly
businessDistrict.description: Join us for life sized Monopoly! Win candy and prizes. This event is sponsored by the members of the Epsilon Lambda chapter of Delta Sigma Pi.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Andrew Greene, Adnan Syed, Alexandra Myers, Shikhar Chawla, Jules Blackburn-Baskin, Tik Ho (Andy) Chan, Kyrie Ciricillo, Salvatore Fabozzi, Edwin Jensen , MacKenzie Thomson , Elisabeth Vosburgh, Paige Glickman, Justin Batra, Alana Bichutsky, Peter Bilzerian, Rachel Ferrara, Jackson Wikstrom, Sam Liang, Manuel Acosta, Peggy Tirrell, Sean Hansen, Kathleen Hagelberger, Amelia Sykes, Ieva Backute, Pranesh Das Purandaradoss, Valeria Martinez, Adit Shetty, Austin Obiora

businessDistrict.name: Global Business Group
businessDistrict.description: Poster display to show networking and diversity.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Lauren Heary, Gurpreet Kaur

businessDistrict.name: Link By Link
businessDistrict.description: We are a team of students challenging the narrative associated with extreme terrorism in our country. Many people are treated unequally in America because of their religion or ethnicity being associated with negative, terrorist stereotypes. Our goal is to show that regardless of race and religion, we're not all that different. We are re-shaping the narrative- link by link.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Teodora Toteva, Luciana Vianna, Abigail Van Nostrand, Fazila Kanchwala

businessDistrict.name: Managing a Project for Camp Good Days
businessDistrict.description: See project management in action! We are completing a fundraising event for Camp Good Days and we want to show you what the donation will help the children effected by cancer experience at camp!
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Rebecca Fultz, Pamela Hernandez, Dakota Clay

businessDistrict.name: Nerf Jeopardy
businessDistrict.description: Like Jeopardy? Enjoy shooting Nerf toys? Then this exhibit is for you. Stop by Saunders College of Business and play business Jeopardy. Determine the category which you will participate by hitting the Jeopardy board. Raffle prizes by the end of the day to participants who answered correct!
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Dave Ballard

businessDistrict.name: RIT Theater Program
businessDistrict.description: Does RIT need a Black Box Theater? We will explore this question and if the answer is yes, we will discuss possible locations, as well as costs and possible marketing strategies for such a theater.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Taurance Robnett, Ty Clauss, Jeff Kosakowski, Dakota Clay

businessDistrict.name: Snow Cones
businessDistrict.description: Visit the Saunders College of Business for a free snow cone!
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Lauren Heary

businessDistrict.name: TEDxRIT
businessDistrict.description: TEDxRIT showcases the ideas that RIT students chose. We will be highlighting our clubs vision, our event(s) and our goal of serving the local community, organized and plans solely by students.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Theodore Johnston

businessDistrict.name: The Kracauer Experiment: A Study in A/V Synthesis
businessDistrict.description: Synthesthesia. Psychoacoustics. Movement. Immerse yourself in the mind altering world of Audio / Visual Synthesis. The Kracauer experiment melds Rochester's fattest grooves with interactive multimedia in our pop-up lab. Your mind and body will slip into an altered state while synthesized waves and light rays pour into your consciousness. This collaboration between Wicked Squid Studios, The Empire Film Music Ensemble, and Floated Magazine will be a multimedia experience you won't wanna miss.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Jonathan Kruger, Ben Escobar, Josh Pettinger

businessDistrict.name: USA-Croatia Exchange Program
businessDistrict.description: USA-Croatia Global Exchange gives students of International Business program the opportunity to partake in a unique cultural exchange program, joining a cohort of students consisting of RIT Rochester and RIT Croatia campuses. Students embark on a one semester journey, starting the semester in Croatia for a span of six weeks after which students will be travelling to Rochester to complete two more accelerated courses and participate in multiple field trips around Rochester. The exhibit will be a presentation created by the cohort of students from both the USA and Croatia.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Lauren Heary

businessDistrict.name: Vantage News
businessDistrict.description: Vantage News is a one of a kind mobile application for the news obsessed. To become truly informed, one article isn't enough. Alternative perspectives, historical context, and related stories are critical to getting the big picture. Vantage's framing feature is the news junkie's gateway not just to knowledge, but also to understanding.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Ty Clauss, Michael Shullick, Pablo Ordorica

businessDistrict.name: VENU Information Booth
businessDistrict.description: Venu is a wayfinding app for Imagine RIT that recommends exhibits and events at the festival based on your interests and preferences. At this information booth, we'll introduce you to the app and provide technical support if needed. If you don't already have Venu, we'll have devices with Venu loaded for you to use as a demo, as well as monitors showing live data from the Venu app. Venu is a senior project created by students in the New Media Design BFA and New Media Interactive Development BS programs at RIT. Our team members will be located at a second booth location in the James E. Booth building, so stop by and say hello!
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Jeffwaslin Dinh, Jenna Ammerall

businessDistrict.name: YEA: Saunders Scholars WINNER
businessDistrict.description: The Young Entrepreneurs Academy (YEA!) Saunders Scholars Competition brings together the top student businesses from each YEA! class around the country to compete to win scholarship dollars, and business start-up prize packages. The WINNER of the competition will be showing their business plan at Imagine RIT.
businessDistrict.exhibitors: Lauren Heary
